sections.title: I am the Lord your God; you shall not have strange gods before me

questions.text: Have I prayed to God every day?
Have I remembered that God loves me always?
Have I talked to God only when I wanted something?
Have I made other things more important than God (like games or toys)?
Have I trusted God when I was scared or sad?
Have I thanked God for my blessings?
Have I learned about God with love and joy?

sections.title: You shall not take the name of the Lord your God in vain

questions.text: Have I said God’s name with respect?
Have I used God's name in a joke or when I was mad?
Have I reminded others to speak kindly about God?
Have I made fun of holy things or church?
Have I said prayers with a loving heart?
Have I stayed quiet when others used God’s name wrongly?
Have I been careful with how I talk about Jesus and Mary?

sections.title: Remember to keep holy the Lord’s Day

questions.text: Have I gone to Mass on Sundays with my family?
Have I paid attention and prayed at Mass?
Have I been happy to go to church or complained about it?
Have I used Sundays to rest and spend time with my family?
Have I made Sunday special by being extra kind?
Have I thought about Jesus on His special day?
Have I used Sunday to grow closer to God?

sections.title: Honor your father and your mother

questions.text: Have I obeyed my parents the first time they asked?
Have I talked respectfully to my parents and teachers?
Have I said 'please' and 'thank you' often?
Have I helped at home with a cheerful heart?
Have I thanked my parents for what they do for me?
Have I prayed for my family?
Have I made life at home more peaceful and happy?
Have I been kind to others and avoided hurting anyone?
Have I used my hands or words to hurt someone?
Have I held a grudge or refused to forgive?
Have I spoken nicely to brothers, sisters, and classmates?
Have I helped someone who was sad or left out?
Have I remembered that all people are made by God?
Have I said sorry when I hurt someone?
Have I remembered that my body is a gift from God?
Have I respected others' bodies and personal space?
Have I kept my thoughts and words pure and kind?
Have I watched or listened to things I shouldn’t?
Have I talked about private things in a wrong way?
Have I asked God to help me be pure and holy?
Have I acted in a way that makes Jesus proud?
Have I taken anything that didn’t belong to me?
Have I returned things I borrowed?
Have I shared my toys and treats?
Have I been honest even when it was hard?
Have I used other people's things with care?
Have I helped others take care of their things?
Have I said thank you when someone shared with me?

sections.title: You shall not bear false witness against your neighbor

questions.text: Have I told the truth even when it was hard?
Have I lied to get out of trouble or to look good?
Have I gossiped or told secrets I shouldn’t?
Have I hurt others by what I said about them?
Have I fixed things when I said something untrue?
Have I spoken kindly even when others did not?
Have I kept my promises?

sections.title: You shall not covet your neighbor’s wife

questions.text: Have I been happy for others and their friendships?
Have I been jealous when others got attention or love?
Have I shared my friends instead of keeping them to myself?
Have I tried to love my family as they are?
Have I thanked God for the people who love me?
Have I remembered that love is not a competition?
Have I prayed for families who need more love?

sections.title: You shall not covet your neighbor’s goods

questions.text: Have I been jealous of others’ toys, clothes, or homes?
Have I been greedy or always wanted more?
Have I been thankful for what I have?
Have I celebrated others’ blessings with joy?
Have I shared with others without complaining?
Have I been happy with simple things?
Have I remembered that people are more important than things?
